contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox person | name = Kazusa Murai<br>村井 かずさ | image = | imagesize = | caption = | birth_name = | birth_date = {{birth date and age|1975|12|28}} | birth_place = [[Nagoya, Aichi]], Japan | death_date = | death_place = | other_names = | nationality = | occupation = [[Seiyū|Voice actress]] | years_active = | spouse = | partner = | website = }} {{nihongo|'''Kazusa Murai'''|村井 かずさ|Murai Kazusa|born December 28, 1975 in [[Nagoya, Aichi|Nagoya]], [[Aichi Prefecture]], [[Japan]]}} is a Japanese [[seiyū|voice actress]]. ==Notable voice roles== ===Anime=== *[[Kamichama Karin]] (Miyon Yi) *[[Angelic Layer]] (Maria Shibata) *[[Boys Be...]] (Chiharu Nitta) *[[Full Metal Panic!]] (Dana) *[[Ginban Kaleidoscope]] (Kyōko Shitō) *[[Haibane Renmei]] (Nemu) *[[Magical Play]] (MyuMyu) *[[Magic User's Club]] (Saki Sawanoguchi) *[[Mirmo!]] (Saburou, Yamane, Chai) *[[Pokémon (anime)|Pokémon]] (Marina) *[[Shugo Chara!]] (Midori Hinamori) *[[Shugo Chara!|Shugo Chara!! Doki-]] (Hinamori Midori,Kiran) *[[Hamtaro|Tokkoto Hamutarō]] (Ribon-chan) *[[Zegapain]] (Isola) *[[Black Rock Shooter]] (Mato's Mother) *[[Transformers: Prime]] (Airachind) ===Video games=== *[[Tokimeki Memorial 2]] (Kaori Yae) ===Dubbing=== *[[Totally Spies!]] ([[List of characters in Totally Spies!#Clover|Clover]]) ==External links== * {{ann|people|850}} *[http://haikyo.or.jp/PROFILE/woman/11678.html Haikyou] {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Murai Kazusa | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Japanese voice actor | DATE OF BIRTH = 1975 | PLACE OF BIRTH = [[Nagoya, Aichi]], Japan | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Murai Kazusa}} [[Category:1975 births]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:People from Nagoya]] [[Category:Japanese voice actresses]] {{Japan-voice-actor-stub}}
